header.WhatWasTheMostDifficultTaskInProject: What was the most difficult task in project?
header.WhatWasTheFunniestTaskInProject: What was the funniest task in project?

message.theMostDifficult: To be honest, this project was not a big challenge for me. I've already had contact with all aspects and functions of such an application. However, if I had to choose something, the most difficult for me was to figure out a mobile view for the Header.
message.theFunniest: The coolest task in the project was the visual design of the application and the implementation of invented solutions.
